attributes.action: Consider Taxing the high profits of Oil Companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of Petrol and other fuels is incresing every week and the Oil Companies are making record profits.
Will the PM ask the industry to reduce the cost at the pump.If they refuse consider a tax on  there incresed profits.Action is need very quickly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
